welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Killamarsh, the charming town known for its beautiful countryside and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourselves in the rich history and culture of our lovely city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robin Hood Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Robin Hood Airport is used for shipping goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport is exclusively for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
